name: exciting turtles for kids - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. This application is composed of two different games:

first game:
This is a typical machine simple game of slot where you have to make certain combinations to make points to complete the level. Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful a turtle image becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game your child will burst as many balloons to the next level. While the environment is running, just press on the screen to pop the balloons visible. Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful a turtle image becomes available in the image gallery.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay adapted to children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of turtles.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of turtles to be released.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovene, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
